form.group-name-help-text: Select the group to be privileged for the path
form.user-name-help-text: Select the user to be privileged for the path
form.path-help-text: Enter an exact path or a pattern. To protect a complete folder use a star at the end of the path (e.g.: trunk/*)

confirm-delete.title: Delete Path Permission
confirm-delete.message: Do you really want to delete the Path Permission?

scm-pathwp-plugin.is-enabled-help-text: If enabled, nobody can write to the repository expect administrators, repository owners and the specified rules.
